title: Grand Prix Zandvoort
overview: Formula 1 returns to Zandvoort. The Grand Prix of the Netherlands returns on the F1 calendar for the first time since 1985 with the Dutch driver Max Verstappen being one of the favourites to win. Sporting director of the Dutch GP Jan Lammers makes an unique journey through time through the fascinating and turbulent history of the Formula 1 races on the Zandvoort Circuit.
